mapper.select: select id, user_id, transaction_id, status, type, amount, dateline_create, dateline_end, platform, platform_person, platform_account, platform_serial_num, remark_user, remark_admin from nxt_withdraw where id = #{id}

select id, user_id, transaction_id, status, type, amount, dateline_create, dateline_end, platform, platform_person, platform_account, platform_serial_num, remark_user, remark_admin from nxt_withdraw limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into nxt_withdraw(user_id, transaction_id, status, type, amount, dateline_create, dateline_end, platform, platform_person, platform_account, platform_serial_num, remark_user, remark_admin) values (#{userId}, #{transactionId}, #{status}, #{type}, #{amount}, #{datelineCreate}, #{datelineEnd}, #{platform}, #{platformPerson}, #{platformAccount}, #{platformSerialNum}, #{remarkUser}, #{remarkAdmin})

insert into nxt_withdraw(user_id, transaction_id, status, type, amount, dateline_create, dateline_end, platform, platform_person, platform_account, platform_serial_num, remark_user, remark_admin) values
(#{entity.userId}, #{entity.transactionId}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.type}, #{entity.amount}, #{entity.datelineCreate}, #{entity.datelineEnd}, #{entity.platform}, #{entity.platformPerson}, #{entity.platformAccount}, #{entity.platformSerialNum}, #{entity.remarkUser}, #{entity.remarkAdmin})

insert into nxt_withdraw(user_id, transaction_id, status, type, amount, dateline_create, dateline_end, platform, platform_person, platform_account, platform_serial_num, remark_user, remark_admin) values
(#{entity.userId}, #{entity.transactionId}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.type}, #{entity.amount}, #{entity.datelineCreate}, #{entity.datelineEnd}, #{entity.platform}, #{entity.platformPerson}, #{entity.platformAccount}, #{entity.platformSerialNum}, #{entity.remarkUser}, #{entity.remarkAdmin})
on duplicate key update user_id = values(user_id) , transaction_id = values(transaction_id) , status = values(status) , type = values(type) , amount = values(amount) , dateline_create = values(dateline_create) , dateline_end = values(dateline_end) , platform = values(platform) , platform_person = values(platform_person) , platform_account = values(platform_account) , platform_serial_num = values(platform_serial_num) , remark_user = values(remark_user) , remark_admin = values(remark_admin)
mapper.update:
update nxt_withdraw
user_id = #{userId},
transaction_id = #{transactionId},
status = #{status},
type = #{type},
amount = #{amount},
dateline_create = #{datelineCreate},
dateline_end = #{datelineEnd},
platform = #{platform},
platform_person = #{platformPerson},
platform_account = #{platformAccount},
platform_serial_num = #{platformSerialNum},
remark_user = #{remarkUser},
remark_admin = #{remarkAdmin},
where id = #{id}
